definition: to bleed from the nose/(fig.) to be sexually aroused
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Many reasons for nosebleeds, but about half of them can not find reason.

sentences.english: Sara pulls Michael aside to ask him about the nosebleeds.

sentences.english: When the people rise in blood, especially lung hotter, the people will nosebleeds.
